name: Bella Hair Bobbies in Japanese Garden
description: Bella Bobbies are the fast and easy way to add style to your hair! Each bobbie pin is made with a 2 inch hair pin in silver and the 3/4” buttons are permanently attached. This listing is for one set of 4 hair bobbies. Fabric pattern placement may vary from what is shown. Custom orders are always welcome. I can do these with any size or color of clip/elastic you choose! All items shipped USPS First Class w/ delivery confirmation. If you need other shipping options, please contact me. International buyers are welcome!

name: Little Red Riding Hood Bella Hair Clips
description:
Bella Clips are the fast and easy way to add style to your hair!

Each hair clip is made with a snag free clip in brown and the 7/8” buttons are permanently attached.

This listing is for one set of 2 hair clips.

Custom orders are always welcome. I can do these with any size or color of clip or elastic you choose!

All items shipped USPS First Class w/ delivery confirmation. If you need other shipping options, please contact me. International buyers are welcome!

name: Ladybug on Clover Bella Petite Hair Ponies
description:
Bella Ponies are a great way to add style to your hair!

Whether you are having a bad hair day or you woke up late, these fun ponytail holders are the perfect solution for little girls or big girls!

These ponytail holders use a smaller elastic for little girls or people with fine hair!

Each ponytail holder is made with a Goody Ouchless elastic in a coordinating color and the 7/8” buttons are permanently attached.

This listing is for one set of 2 ponytail holders.

Custom orders are always welcome. I can do these with any size or color of elastic or clip you choose!

All items shipped USPS First Class w/ delivery confirmation. If you need other shipping options, please contact me. International buyers are welcome!

name: Little Bird On A Branch Bella Ring
description:
*ALL RINGS ARE MADE TO ORDER. PLEASE ALLOW 3 EXTRA DAYS TO PROCESS.*

Bella Rings are a great way to add fun to any outfit! Casual or Dressy, this is perfect!

Each ring is made with lovely fabric and an adjustable ring in silver. The 3/4" button is permanently attached to the ring.

This listing is for one ring.

*Custom orders are always welcome. I can do this with any fabric you choose!*

All items shipped USPS First Class w/ delivery confirmation. If you need other shipping options, please contact me. International buyers are welcome!

**Only available with a light blue background.**

name: Dots Bella Earrings
description:
Bella Earrings are a great way to add style to any outfit! Casual or Dressy, these earrings are perfect!

Each earring is made with lovely fabric and a nickel free post. The 5/8" buttons are permanently attached to the post.

This listing is for one pair of earrings.

*Custom orders are always welcome. I can do these with any fabric you choose!*

All items shipped USPS First Class w/ delivery confirmation. If you need other shipping options, please contact me. International buyers are welcome!
